# First Move Strategy for Minesweeper

Looking at a completely unexplored board, I need to make my first move. In Minesweeper, the optimal first move is typically to click in the center of the board, as this provides the best chance of opening up a large area.

Since this is a 10x10 board, the center would be around coordinates (4,4) or (5,5). I'll choose one of these center positions for my first reveal.

EXPLANATION: Making the first move in the center of the board (position 5,5) to maximize the chance of opening up a large area. This is a standard opening strategy in Minesweeper.
